{"id":283023662,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1575237527,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"248 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/283023662/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"14 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def findUnsortedSubarray(self, arr) -> int:\n        \"\"\"O(nlogn) time | O(1) space\"\"\"\n        INF = float('inf')\n        sorted_arr = sorted(arr)\n        min_ = INF\n        max_ = 0\n        for i in range(len(arr)):\n            if sorted_arr[i] != arr[i]:\n                min_ = min(min_, i)\n                max_ = max(max_, i)\n        return max_ - min_ + 1 if min_ != INF else 0","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
